Grid System

CSS Grid options to place your content.

Grid Columns

Auto Width Columns: Add class "grid grid-col" to the parent element. The child elements is automatically arranged next to each other in the grid system and the width is automatically assigned by the CSS grid system.

First Div
I'm another Div

Div takes the content width.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

Equal Width Columns

Add class "grid repeat-col-(x)" to the parent element. The child elements is automatically arranged next to each other in the grid system and the width is automatically assigned by the CSS grid system.

The child elements will take up 3 columns and repeat itself.

First Div
I'm another Div

Div width is same as other children.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

Grid Rows

Add class " grid grid-row" to the parent element to stack it's children.

Div
Div
Div
Div
Div
Div

Note: The children take full width if they are block elements.

Inline Grid Rows

Take Content Width : Here the parent div is set to "inline-grid".

Div
I'm another Div.
Div with a margin bottom.
Third Div
Div
Div

Note : Grid gap dose not work with inline grid if column span is not specified.
